flawed_nl_solution:
The second student guessed 800 because 8 x 100 = <<800=800>>800
The third guessed 630 because 800 - 200 = <<800-200=630>>630
The total guesses of the first three is 1530 because 100 + 800 + 630 = <<100+800+630=1530>>1530
The average of the first three guesses is 510 because 1530 / 3 = <<1530/3=510>>510
The fourth student guessed 535 because 510 + 25 = <<510+25=535>>535
#### 535

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 600, not 630. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
